name: Weapons Drawn, Paths Restless
desc: After any ally target defeats any enemy target, advances the ally target's action by 100%. At the beginning of the next turn, the ally target gains 4 stack(s) of "Critical Boost."
enhanced_desc: Increases ally targets' SPD by 12%. After defeating any enemy target, advances the ally target's action by 100%, and this ally target gains 6 stack(s) of "Critical Boost" at the beginning of the next turn.
